Circulars & Orders

Official Communications Updated: September 2024

Access official circulars, administrative orders, notifications, and instructions issued by the GAD-IT Department. These documents provide guidance on IT policies, procedures, and administrative matters.

Circular
Sep 15, 2024
New

Implementation of Artificial Intelligence in Government Services

Guidelines for implementation of AI-based solutions in government departments to enhance service delivery and operational efficiency.

Circular No: GAD-IT/AI/2024/15
Subject: AI Implementation Framework
Applicable To: All Government Departments
Download PDF View Details
Government Order
Aug 28, 2024

Cybersecurity Framework for State Government

Mandatory cybersecurity measures and protocols to be implemented across all state government departments and agencies.

Order No: GAD-IT/CYB/2024/08
Authority: Principal Secretary, GAD-IT
Effective Date: September 1, 2024
Download PDF View Details
Notification
Aug 10, 2024

Digital Skills Training Program for Government Employees

Notification regarding mandatory digital skills training program for all government employees to enhance digital literacy.

Notification No: GAD-IT/TRG/2024/12
Training Period: September - December 2024
Target Group: All Government Employees
Download PDF View Details
Administrative Instruction
Jul 25, 2024

Cloud Computing Policy Implementation Guidelines

Detailed instructions for implementing cloud computing solutions in government departments with security and compliance requirements.

Instruction No: GAD-IT/CLOUD/2024/07
Implementation: Phased Approach
Compliance: Mandatory
Download PDF View Details
Circular
Jul 08, 2024

Data Protection and Privacy Guidelines

Comprehensive guidelines for data protection, privacy compliance, and handling of citizen data across government systems.

Circular No: GAD-IT/DP/2024/11
Compliance: Immediate Implementation
Review Date: January 2025
Download PDF View Details
Government Order
Jun 20, 2024

Digital Payment Integration for Government Services

Order for mandatory integration of digital payment gateways in all government service portals and applications.

Order No: GAD-IT/PAY/2024/06
Implementation: By December 2024
Support: Technical Team Available
Download PDF View Details
